sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pipes', templateUrl: './pipes.component.html', styles: [] }) export class PipesComponent { title = 'my-first-app'; todaydate = new Date(); jsonval = {name: 'Alex', age: '25', address:{a1: 'Paris', a2: 'France'}}; months = ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'April', 'May', 'Jun', 'July', 'Aug', 'Sept', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']; }

Uppercase Pipe

{{title | uppercase}}

Lowercase Pipe

{{title | lowercase}}

Currency Pipe

{{6589.23 | currency:"USD"}}

Date pipe

{{todaydate | date:'d/M/y'}}
{{todaydate | date:'shortTime'}}

Decimal Pipe

{{ 454.78787814 | number: '3.4-4' }}

Json Pipe

{{ jsonval | json }}

Percent Pipe

{{00.54565 | percent}}

Slice Pipe

{{months | slice:2:6}}

CustomPipe

{{title | customPipe}}
